basic_info.title: Azerbaijan Government Scholarship 2024-25 (Fully Funded)
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed
basic_info.program_name: Heydar Aliyev International Education Grant Program
basic_info.funded_by: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Ministry of Science and Education of the Republic of Azerbaijan

program_details.description: The Heydar Aliyev International Education Grant Program offers 100 fully funded scholarships to international students to pursue undergraduate, graduate, doctoral, and medical residency programs in leading universities in Azerbaijan.
participating_universities: Azerbaijan State Oil and Industry University
Azerbaijan University of Architecture and Construction

financial_coverage: Monthly stipend of 470 USD for living expenses, accommodation, and educational materials

waiver_conditions: Proof of education in English Medium

required_documents: All previous transcripts, degrees, diplomas, school certificates
Copy of the medical certificate (including HIV/AIDS, Hepatitis B/C tests)
application_process: Applicants must wait for the call for applications announced by their respective entities/government authorities.
Applicants must apply and submit documents to the respective authorities.
The respective authorities will select applicants and will nominate the students.
After the nominations, students will proceed to the second stage of the application process and apply through the Study in Azerbaijan Centralized Admission Service (SIACAS) website (portal.edu.az)
